Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Sexuality \Sex`u*al"i*ty\, n. The quality or state of being distinguished by sex. --Lindley. [1913 Webster]
sexuality n : the properties that distinguish organisms on the basis of their reproductive roles; "she didn't want to know the sex of the foetus" [syn: {sex}, {gender}]
